short_summary: Transport Canada requires a database of original vehicle dimensions, with options for three (3) one-year extensions.
description: Transport Canada / Transports Canada requires the compilation of a database of original vehicle dimensions for light-duty vehicles for the 2023 model year with options to collect the data for three (3) additional one (1) year periods. The Canadian Vehicle Specifications (CVS) database is used for investigation and reconstruction of real-world crashes.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement** 
==========================

**Contract Title and Description**

* **English Title**: Administration of Data Collection for the Canadian Vehicle Specifications Database
* **French Title**: Collecte de données pour la Base de données canadienne sur les spécifications des véhicules
* **Description**: This project involves compiling a comprehensive database of original vehicle dimensions for light-duty vehicles for the 2023 model year, with optional extensions for three additional one-year periods.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-220115
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-20T14:00:00 (expired)
